_sText: I'm glad that this is finally done now.. I'd call this a mixture of cs_assault, cs_office and de_train but still very diffrent. It has a proper story fitting the map's name and theme. Terrorists try to get to the bombsites as CTs spawn near them, and try to hold that area. either from close quarters or sniper range. theres a small office complex on the middle, and terrorists can get there from ducts also. See a walktrough video of the map. Some stuff: working doors, sounds, NAV for bots & areas and Radar screen Bads: i couldnt get HDR working properly so you cant use it in this map. (Sorry!) Special thanks to Kurrus for making the radar and helping me test it! Thanks for downloading! Please comment and assess! :) UPDATED! (1.7.08) Bots should act nice and clean now thanks to chizbone, who properly NAV mapped this map. Thank you!
